mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (title, content, user_id) VALUES (#{title}, #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE status = 'PUBLIC'

SELECT RN as "rowNum",b.id as "boardId", b.title as "title", TO_CHAR(b.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "createdAt", u.name as "userName", COUNT(c.id) as "commentsCount" FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, public_ordered_board.* FROM (SELECT * FROM board WHERE status = 'PUBLIC' ORDER BY created_at) public_ordered_board) b, users u, comments c WHERE b.user_id = u.id AND b.id = c.board_id(+) AND RN BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo} GROUP BY RN, b.id, b.title, b.created_at, u.name ORDER BY RN DESC

SELECT b. id as "boardId", b.title as "boardTitle", b.status as "boardStatus", DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.content, 4000, 1) as "boardContent", TO_CHAR(b.created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as "boardCreatedAt", u.id as "userId", u.name as "userName" FROM board b INNER JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.id WHERE b.id = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content, jdbcType=CLOB}, modify_at = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE board SET status = 'DELETED', deleted_at = SYSDATE WHERE id = #{boardId}
